All Classes

Class Description
AckBlock
message block's ack
AckMove
message move's ack
AckPlayer
message player's ack
AckStartGame
message start game
AskBuildBeforeMoveEvent
message ask build before move event
AskBuildEvent
message ask build event
AskCardEvent
message ask card event
AskInitializeWorkerEvent
message ask initialize worker event
AskMoveEvent
message ask move event
AskNCardsEvent
message ask n cards event
AskNPlayerEvent
message ask number of players event
AskPlayerEvent
message ask player event
AskWantToPlayEvent
message starting connection event
AskWorkerToMoveEvent
message ask worker event
Base
This class represents the first level of the building
BasicGod
This is God concrete class which implements the basic moves of the workers and of the build
Block
This interface represents the general Block that composes a building
Board
This class represents the board where the game will be played
Box
This class represents the boxes that make up the board
BuildABlockUnderItself
This class implements the ability to build a block under an own worker
BuildBeforeWorkerMove
This class implements the ability to build before the worker move: you can build, move a worker at the same level or lower, and then build again.
BuildDome
This class implements the ability to build a Dome everywhere even the player is not building at the fourth level
Building
This class represents the building using a factory method
BuildingBase
This class builds the base in a building using the factory method
BuildingDome
This class builds the dome in a building using the factory method
BuildingInvisibleBlk
This class builds an invisible block in a building using the factory method
BuildingMiddle
This class builds the middle level in a building using the factory method
BuildingTop
This class builds the top level in a building using the factory method
BuildInTheSamePosition
This class implements the ability to build twice in the same position
BuildNotAlongThePerimeter
This class implements the ability to build twice, but the second time, the worker cannot build in a perimeter space
CardCreator
class to initialize the deck of cards for a game
Client
This class is used to create the connection of a client with the server
CLIView
Class that manages the CLI view
CloseConnectionFromClientEvent
message closing event
CloseConnectionFromServerEvent
message closing event
Color
Enum used to collect all the color used to print the game field
CompleteTowersWin
This class implements the ability to win when there are also at least five complete towers on the board
ConnectionHandlerClientSide
This class is used to managed the client connection to the serve
ConnectionHandlerServerSide
This class handles all the clients that get connected
Controller
This class is the controller of MVC pattern: it controls all the game flow.
Dead
Class of the player's state if he has lost
Dome
This class represents the fourth level of the building
DownTwoOrMoreLevelsWin
This class implements the ability to win if the worker moves down two or more levels lower
EchoServer
This class represents the server
EndState
State used if the game is over
Event
abstract message for the visitor pattern
FerryAnOpponentWorker
This class implements the ability to force a neighboring opponent worker to the space on the other side of own worker, if that space is unoccupied
Game
This is the main class that represents the game
GameModel
This interface is composed by all the game methods that the controller can call
GameState
Abstract class with common methods for the different states
GameStateManager
This class manages the changes of game state allowing only some functions based on the state
God
This interface represents the God for the decorator pattern
GodDecorator
This abstract class handles the different concrete decorators
GoingState
State used if the game is going
GUIMain
This is the application class to show the gui
InvisibleBlock
This class represents the invisible level of the building
IsPlaying
Class of the player's state if he is in the game yet and it's his turn
IsWaiting
Class of the player's state if he is in the game yet but is the turn of an opponent
LoserEvent
message to the player who has lost
Middle
This class represents the second level of the building
MoveInfinityTimesAlongThePerimeter
This class implements the ability to move the same worker any times you want, but it has to move into a perimeter space.
MoveTwice
This class implements the possibility to move twice at the same turn
MoveWorkerTwice
This class implements the ability to move twice the same worker
NotMoveUp
This class implements the ability to not move up of the opponent workers
ObjBlock
message block to build
ObjBlockBeforeMove
message block before move
ObjCard
message card
ObjHeartBeat
message heartbeat
ObjMessage
abstract message for the visitor pattern
ObjMove
message move worker
ObjNumPlayer
message number of player
ObjPlayer
message player's information
ObjState
message state of the game
ObjTempCard
message cards for the game's initialization
ObjWait
message wait for a game
ObjWorkers
message workers
ObjWorkerToMove
message worker to move
ObjYouCanPlay
message join a game
Observer
This interface is the subject class of the observer pattern
OpponentBlock
This class implements the ability to not allow to move up to the other players
OtherPositionToBuild
This class implements the ability to build twice in two different positions
Player
This class represents the player who is playing the game
PlayerState
Abstract class with common methods for the different states
PlayerStateManager
This class manages the changes of player state allowing only some functions based on the state
ProxyGameModel
This class is composed by all the GameModel and Subject methods
SendMessageToClient
class to send messages to server
SendMessageToServer
class to send messages to the clients
ShiftWorker
This class implements the ability to shift an opponent worker in a new position
StartGameEvent
message start event
Subject
This interface is the subject class of the observer pattern
SwitchWorker
This class implements the ability to switch the position with an enemy worker
Top
This class represents the third level of the building
UpdateBoardEvent
message update of the game's data
User
class that contains information of a player in a game
View
Interface that defines the methods used by both the CLI view and the GUI view
ViewGUIController
Controller class associated to every scene to manage the GUIView
VirtualView
This class is the view of the MVC pattern server's side
VisitorMessageFromClient
Visitor pattern server's side to invoke methods on the virtualView
VisitorMessageFromServer
Visitor pattern client's side to invoke methods on the view
WhoHasLostEvent
message losing event
Win
Class of the player's state if he is in the game yet and it's his turn
WinnerEvent
message win event
Worker
This class is the Worker associated to the player during a match
